rows.label: qev087504_MSG0001
rows.name: Alan, look! We found a capacitor![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087504_MSG0002
rows.name: Amazing. I have to hand it to the Ganglion's engineers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087504_MSG0005
rows.name:
With a mix of their tech and ours,
I may even be able to do this one better.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087504_MSG0006
rows.name:
If that still not enough,
Tatsu can loan out secret Nopon technology![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087504_MSG0008
rows.name: One problem down, one to go.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087504_MSG0009
rows.name: All right, problems solved! Let's report back to the commander![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087504_MSG0010
rows.name: Qmoevan capacitors are hi-spec Ganglion items.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087504_MSG0011
rows.name:
You should be able to get them from Qmoevas
in Oblivia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087504_MSG0012
rows.name:
Hmm, let's see. Could I ask you to go collect three of
those Qmoevan capacitors now for analysis?[ST:wait ]
